title: ExtendedIdentifierType
description: Identifier that supports the UN/EDIFACT data element 3055 code list.

schemeId.description: The identification of the identification scheme.

schemeName.description: The name of the identification scheme.

agencyId.description: The identification of the agency that maintains the identification scheme.

agencyName.description: The name of the agency that maintains the identification scheme.

versionId.description: The version of the identification scheme.

schemeDataURI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier that identifies where the identification scheme data is located.

schemeURI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier that identifies where the identification scheme is located.

value.description: A character string to identify and distinguish uniquely, one instance of an object in an identification scheme from all other objects in the same scheme together with relevant supplementary information.
